msg.msgText: Use the PluginMaxHeapSize configuration to set the JVM maximum heap size of the Plug-in server. The value is in megabytes. Set PluginMaxHeapSize to an empty value to reset PluginMaxHeapSize to its default value. SYNTAX: imaserver set PluginMaxHeapSize help imaserver set "PluginMaxHeapSize=512" imaserver set "PluginMaxHeapSize="

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
